translation: King Yudhishthira, the son of Kunti, blew the Anantavijaya; Nakula and Sahadeva blew the Sughosha and the Manipushpaka.
commentary: 1.16 Anantavijayam (the conch named) Anantavijayam? King the king? Kuntiputrah son of Kunti? Yudhisthira: Yudhishthira? Nakula: Nakula? Sahadeva: Sahadeva? f and? Sughoshamanipushpakau (the conches named) Sughosha and Manipushpaka.No Commentary.
